description: Square roots of the sum of the digits of n in the case that this is a perfect square.
example: 6^2 = 36 and 3+6 = 9 is a square, thus 3 is in the sequence. 13^2 = 169 and 1+6+9 = 16 is a square, thus 4 is in the sequence.
maple: readlib(issqr): f := []: for n from 1 to 200 do if issqr(convert(convert(n^2,base,10),`+`)) then f := [op(f),sqrt(convert(convert(n^2,base,10),`+`))] fi; od; f;
author: Asher Auel (asher.auel(AT)reed.edu), May 17 2001
